verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> They Came <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other Side <S%G4008><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Sea, <S%G2281><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Country <S%G5561><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Gadarenes. <S%G1046><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1831><s%> On His Having Gone Forth <S%G846><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ship, <S%G4143><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> Met <S%G528><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tombs <S%G3419><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> <S%G4151><s%> An Unclean Spirit, <S%G169><s%>

Who His <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Dwelling <S%G2731><s%> Had <S%G2192><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tombs; <S%G3419><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not Even <S%G3777><s%> With Chains <S%G254><s%> Anyone (lit. No One) <S%G3762><s%> Was Able <S%G1410><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To Bind, <S%G1210><s%>

Because <S%G1223><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Often <S%G4178><s%> With Fetters <S%G3976><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Chains <S%G254><s%> Had Been Bound, <S%G1210><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Had Been Torn Asunder <S%G1288><s%> ' By <S%G5259><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Chains, <S%G254><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fetters <S%G3976><s%> Had Been Shattered, <S%G4937><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Was Able <S%G2480><s%> To Subdue. <S%G1150><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Continually <S%G1275><s%> Night <S%G3571><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mountains <S%G3735><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tombs <S%G3418><s%> He Was <S%G2258><s%> Crying <S%G2896><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Cutting <S%G2629><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> With Stones. <S%G3037><s%>

<S%G1492><s%> And Having Seen <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Afar, <S%G3113><s%> He Ran <S%G5143><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Did Homage <S%G4352><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Crying <S%G2896><s%> With A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Loud <S%G3173><s%> He Said, <S%G2036><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> To Me <S%G1698><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Thee, <S%G4671><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Most High? <S%G5310><s%> I Adjure <S%G3726><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> <S%G3588><s%> By God, <S%G2316><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Torment. <S%G928><s%>

<S%G3004><s%> For He Was Saying <S%G1063><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Come Forth, <S%G1831><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Unclean, <S%G169><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Man. <S%G444><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Asked <S%G1905><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> What Is <S%G5101><s%> Thy <S%G4671><s%> Name? <S%G3686><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Answered, <S%G611><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Legion <S%G3003><s%> <S%G3686><s%> My Name Is, <S%G3427><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> We Are. <S%G2070><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Besought <S%G3870><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Much, <S%G4183><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> He Would Send <S%G649><s%> Out Of <S%G1854><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Country. <S%G5561><s%>

<S%G2258><s%> Now There Was <S%G1161><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> Just At <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mountains <S%G3735><s%> A Herd <S%G34><s%> Of Swine <S%G5519><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> Feeding; <S%G1006><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Besought <S%G3870><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Demons, <S%G1142><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Send <S%G3992><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Swine, <S%G5519><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> We May Enter. <S%G1525><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Allowed <S%G2010><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Gone Out <S%G1831><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirits <S%G4151><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Unclean <S%G169><s%> Entered <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Swine, <S%G5519><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Rushed <S%G3729><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Herd <S%G34><s%> Down <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Steep <S%G2911><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea, <S%G2281><s%> <S%G2258><s%> now They Were <S%G1161><s%> About <S%G5613><s%> Two Thousand, <S%G1367><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Were Choked <S%G4155><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea. <S%G2281><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And Those Who <S%G1161><s%> Fed <S%G1006><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Swine <S%G5519><s%> Fled, <S%G5343><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Announced It <S%G312><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Country. <S%G68><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Went Out <S%G1831><s%> To See <S%G1492><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> It Is <S%G2076><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Has Been Done. <S%G1096><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Come <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> See <S%G2334><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Possessed By Demons <S%G1139><s%> Sitting <S%G2521><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Clothed <S%G2439><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Sound Mind, <S%G4993><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Him Who Had <S%G2192><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Legion : <S%G3003><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Were Afraid. <S%G5399><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Related <S%G1334><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Had Seen It <S%G1492><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> It Happened <S%G1096><s%> To Him <S%G3588><s%> Possessed By Demons, <S%G1139><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Swine. <S%G5519><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> They Began <S%G756><s%> To Beseech <S%G3870><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To Depart <S%G565><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3725><s%> Their Borders. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Entered <S%G1684><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ship, <S%G4143><s%> Besought <S%G3870><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> Had Been Possessed By Demons <S%G1139><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> He Might <S%G5600><s%> ' Be With <S%G3326><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Did Not Suffer <S%G863><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Go <S%G5217><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3624><s%> Thy House <S%G4675><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Thine Own, <S%G4674><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Announce <S%G312><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> How Much <S%G3745><s%> For Thee <S%G4671><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Did, <S%G4160><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Pitied <S%G1653><s%> Thee. <S%G4571><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Departed <S%G565><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Began <S%G756><s%> To Proclaim <S%G2784><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Decapolis, <S%G1179><s%> How Much <S%G3745><s%> Had Done <S%G4160><s%> For Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus; <S%G2424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Wondered. <S%G2296><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Passed Over <S%G1276><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ship <S%G4143><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other Side, <S%G4008><s%> Was Gathered <S%G4863><s%> A Crowd <S%G3793><s%> Great <S%G4183><s%> ' To <S%G1909><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Was <S%G2258><s%> By <S%G3844><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea. <S%G2281><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> , Behold, <S%G2400><s%> Comes <S%G2064><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Rulers Of The Synagogue, <S%G752><s%> By Name <S%G3686><s%> Jairus, <S%G2383><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Seeing <S%G1492><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Falls <S%G4098><s%> At <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4228><s%> His Feet; <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Besought <S%G3870><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Much, <S%G4183><s%> <S%G3004><s%> Saying <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2365><s%> My Little Daughter <S%G3450><s%> <S%G2079><s%> Is At The Last Extremity, <S%G2192><s%> I Pray That <S%G2443><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> Thou Wouldest Lay <S%G2007><s%> On Her Thy <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hands, <S%G5495><s%> So That <S%G3704><s%> She May Be Cured, <S%G4982><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> She Shall Live. <S%G2198><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Departed <S%G565><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Followed <S%G190><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> A Crowd <S%G3793><s%> Great, <S%G4183><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Pressed On <S%G4918><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> A Woman <S%G1135><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> Being <S%G5607><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> A Flux <S%G4511><s%> Of Blood <S%G129><s%> Years <S%G2094><s%> Twelve, <S%G1427><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Much <S%G4183><s%> Having Suffered <S%G3958><s%> Under <S%G5259><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Physicians, <S%G2395><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1159><s%> <S%G3588><s%> ' Having Spent <S%G3844><s%> Her Means <S%G1438><s%> All, <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In No Way <S%G3367><s%> Having Benefited <S%G5623><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Rather <S%G3123><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Worse <S%G5501><s%> Having Come, <S%G2064><s%>

Having Heard <S%G191><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd <S%G3793><s%> Behind, <S%G3693><s%> Touched <S%G680><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2440><s%> His Garment; <S%G846><s%>
<S%G3004><s%> <S%G1063><s%> For She Said, <S%G3754><s%> If But <S%G2579><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2440><s%> His Garments <S%G846><s%> I Shall Touch, <S%G680><s%> I Shall Be Cured. <S%G4982><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> Was Dried Up <S%G3583><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fountain <S%G4077><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G129><s%> Of Her Blood, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> She Knew <S%G1097><s%> In Her <S%G3588><s%> Body <S%G4983><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> She Was Healed <S%G2390><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scourge. <S%G3148><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Knowing <S%G1921><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Himself That <S%G1438><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> Had Gone Forth, <S%G1831><s%> Having Turned <S%G1994><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd, <S%G3793><s%> Said, <S%G3004><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> <S%G5101><s%> Of Me <S%G3450><s%> Touched <S%G680><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Garments? <S%G2440><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> Thou Seest <S%G991><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd <S%G3793><s%> Pressing On <S%G4918><s%> Thee, <S%G4571><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sayest Thou, <S%G3004><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> <S%G5101><s%> Me <S%G3450><s%> Touched? <S%G680><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> He Looked Round <S%G4017><s%> To See <S%G1492><s%> Her Who <S%G3588><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Had Done. <S%G4160><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Woman <S%G1135><s%> Being Frightened <S%G5399><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Trembling, <S%G5141><s%> Knowing <S%G1492><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> Had Been Done <S%G1096><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> Her, <S%G846><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Fell Down Before <S%G4363><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Told <S%G2036><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Truth. <S%G225><s%>

<S%G2089><s%> While Yet <S%G846><s%> He Is Speaking, <S%G2980><s%> They Come <S%G2064><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ruler Of The Synagogue's House, <S%G752><s%> <S%G3004><s%> Saying, <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2364><s%> Thy Daughter <S%G4675><s%> Is Dead; <S%G599><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> Still <S%G2089><s%> Troublest Thou <S%G4660><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Teacher? <S%G1320><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Immediately, <S%G2112><s%> Having Heard <S%G191><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Spoken, <S%G2980><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Ruler Of The Synagogue, <S%G752><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Fear; <S%G5399><s%> Only <S%G3440><s%> Believe. <S%G4100><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> He Suffered <S%G863><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G4870><s%> To Accompany, <S%G1487><s%> Except <S%G3361><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> Of James. <S%G2385><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Comes <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3624><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Ruler Of The Synagogue, <S%G752><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Beholds <S%G2334><s%> A Tumult, People <S%G2351><s%> Weeping <S%G2799><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Wailing <S%G214><s%> Greatly. <S%G4183><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Entered <S%G1525><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> Make Ye A Tumult <S%G2350><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Weep? <S%G2799><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Child <S%G3813><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Is Not Dead, <S%G599><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Sleeps. <S%G2518><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Laughed At <S%G2606><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Having Put Out <S%G1544><s%> , All, <S%G537><s%> Takes With Him <S%G3880><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Child <S%G3813><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mother <S%G3384><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Enters In <S%G1531><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Child <S%G3813><s%> Lying. <S%G345><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Taken <S%G2902><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hand <S%G5495><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Child, <S%G3813><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Her, <S%G846><s%> Talitha, <S%G5008><s%> Cum; <S%G2891><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> Being Interpreted, <S%G3177><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Damsel, <S%G2877><s%> To Thee <S%G4671><s%> I Say, <S%G3004><s%> Arise. <S%G1453><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> Arose <S%G450><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Damsel <S%G2877><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Walked, <S%G4043><s%> <S%G2258><s%> For She Was <S%G1063><s%> Years <S%G2094><s%> Twelve Old. <S%G1427><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Were Amazed <S%G1839><s%> With Amazement <S%G1611><s%> Great. <S%G3173><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Charged <S%G1291><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Much <S%G4183><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> No One <S%G3367><s%> Should Know <S%G1097><s%> This; <S%G5124><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Said That Something <S%G2036><s%> Should Be Given <S%G1325><s%> To Her <S%G846><s%> To Eat. <S%G5315><s%>
